title: How to get url value in server scripting processing datatable page?
body:
$("#moduleTable").dataTable({ 
        "aaSorting": [[ 1, "desc" ]],
        "processing": true,
        "aoColumnDefs": [{ "bSortable": false, "aTargets": [0] }],
        oLanguage: {
        sProcessing: "<img id='processing' src='img/animation_processing.gif' style='margin-left:450px;margin-top:100px;' height='150px' width='150px'>" ,

                    },
        "serverSide": true,
        "createdRow": function( row, data, dataIndex ) {
                      },
        "ajax":{
        url :"module_server_list.php", // json datasource
        data:function (d){
            },
        },
    });
